name: Last Life (Open Sourced)
description:
You have your last life and you are attached to it so strongly you'll relive your last moments forever. Find the way out to find the truth.

My entry for Trijam #41 (3hour game jam), Finding music idea took me extra long time, so I overshot 3h limitation.

I tried to hit bonus points:
2) Platformer;
4) I have 3 instead 4 button controls;
5) The truth is a bit easter egg (hint is in description);
1) Obviously I'm using Godot.

Source - https://github.com/nezvers/Godot_3.1_Public_Examples
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb4-Y0E6mmwjtawcitIAzKQ
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NeZversStudio
